常规管理/ 随手笔记/ router
页面路由解析

实现原理：根据hash的变化，利用Ajax原理实现页面无刷新切换；

解决思路：点击切换时，优先获取切换页面路径设置为hash，调用router()方法实现切换；router()方法获取页面hash，经过处理后，通过Ajax来渲染页面。

(function(){
    var B = $('.box');//页面容器
    var views = './';//页面放置路径,须以斜杠/结束
    var hash = '';
    var C = {
        getHash: function(){
            return window.location.hash;
        },
        setHash: function(e){
            window.location.hash = e;
        },
        //渲染
        render: function(e){
            $.ajax({
                type: "get",
                url: C.analyze(e),
                async:true,
                dataType: 'html',
                success: function(e){
                    B.html(e);
                },
                error: function(e){
                    console.log(e);
                }
            });
        },
        //路由解析
        analyze: function(e){
            //斜杠结尾
            return e.match(/.\/$/) ? e+'index.html' : (e.match(/.(.html)$/) ? e : e+'.html'),e.replace('#',views);
        },
        router: function(){
            hash = C.getHash();
            if(hash){
                C.render(hash);
            }
        }
    };
    $('body').on('click', '[j-href]', function(e){
        hash = $(this).attr('j-href');
        C.setHash(hash);
        C.router();
    })
    C.router();
})($)
